hero.title: Where Little Minds Grow Big
hero.subtitle: A nurturing home away from home for your child in Edgewater, NJ

about.title: About Scribbles Learning Center
about.subtitle: Nurturing Young Minds Since 2010
about.story: Scribbles Learning Center is a family-owned childcare facility dedicated to providing a safe, loving, and educational environment for children. For over 15 years, we've been a trusted partner for families in Edgewater and surrounding communities.
about.mission: Our mission is to create a nurturing home away from home where every child can learn, grow, and thrive. We believe in fostering curiosity, creativity, and confidence through play-based learning and individualized attention.

values.title: Safety First
values.description: Video-monitored rooms and secure entry systems keep your child protected.

values.title: Family Atmosphere
values.description: We treat every child as if they were our own family member.

values.title: Quality Education
values.description: Curriculum aligned with NJ Preschool Teaching & Learning Standards.

values.title: Flexibility
values.description: Part-time and full-time schedules to meet your family's needs.

programs.title: Infant Care
programs.description: A gentle, nurturing environment for your baby's first experiences with learning. Our trained caregivers focus on sensory development, early language skills, and creating secure attachments.

programs.title: Toddler Program
programs.description: Active exploration and discovery for curious toddlers! We encourage independence, language development, and social skills through structured play and creative activities.

programs.title: Preschool
programs.description: Kindergarten readiness through play-based learning. Our comprehensive curriculum covers literacy, math, science, and social-emotional development.

programs.title: After School Care
programs.description: A safe and enriching environment for school-age children. We provide homework help, recreational activities, and a healthy snack.

staff.name: Maria Rodriguez
staff.bio: With over 20 years in early childhood education, Maria founded Scribbles with a vision of creating a home-like learning environment.

staff.name: Angela Thompson
staff.bio: Angela brings 10 years of experience caring for infants. Her gentle approach helps babies feel safe and loved.

staff.name: Jennifer Kim
staff.bio: Jennifer's creative curriculum and warm personality make learning fun for our preschoolers.

testimonials.quote: It is a family run daycare and they are very flexible and accommodating to any special request for your child.
testimonials.author: Happy Parent

testimonials.quote: They showed our son so much care, love, and attention, which was shown in his development and peacefulness when we dropped him off.
testimonials.author: Grateful Family

testimonials.quote: My family has become a part of their family and learning community. Their love and care cannot be beat!
testimonials.author: Scribbles Mom

testimonials.quote: Scribbles is an absolutely amazing child care center! The classrooms are spacious and the staff treat the children with love and respect.
testimonials.author: Long-time Parent

pricing.note: Contact us for current rates and availability. We participate in subsidized childcare programs.
